Text: Thanks for another great upload, frankie-boy. And thanks to all the seeders. I'll try to keep this one seeding as long as I can.

send me a message at demonoid
john
I miss your posts, frankie. But I appreciate your past contributions to the scene.
You've just made my day - this looks priceless. Thanks so much! Cheers!

Thanks for missing my posts, jakebot. I have been investing my time in a private tracker. It enables me to get stuff I want and stuff I cannot get here on TPB, but requires I devote most of my bandwidth and time to it. 

Maybe someday, I can come back here and post some of what I have gotten there. The problem is that, without the structure of the private tracker, my posts are not reliably seeded, and I find myself having to reseed some of them often.

But some part of me does miss the wild hinterland of TPB...
I retract my complaints about my torrents not getting seeded here on TPB. I see a lot of seeding going on, and I extend my thanks to those doing so. You are fantastic!

I can't thank you enough for the great films you've given us, but sad to say that a good number of the torrents are dead, or else people are not seeding.  For instance "Women's Prison" lists 3 seeders, but after downloading 62.9%, the one person who had been seeding (who was listed as having 100% of the film) dropped out of sight and I am stuck with a dead torrent.  Same situation with a number of other titles.  I hate to bother you, but can you please reseed at least this title?  I PROMISE to reseed to at least 2.00 IF I can get the complete film.  I do this with all torrents I successfully download.  Many thanks!

Well, something worked: the torrent suddenly jumped to life at a fast speed.  My faith is restored!  I will now reseed for the rest of the week or longer to get the ratio up to at least 2.0.  Thanks for the treasure trove of Noir!
Thanks again for this.  FYI: I seeded it to a ratio of 3.672.  Hopefully, other film noir fans will follow suit and keep this and all of your torrent alive and well!
Thanks,OrpheusDude, for seeding. I am coming around to re-seed occasionally, but it isn;t going to work well without the community participating by seeding.
Reseed by uploader completed December 2011. Please seed.
Thanks for your comments and enthusiasm, OrpheusDude!
I'm stuck at 35.9%, Please seed and I will do the same :)
Thanks for seeding, Good movie for a lazy afternoon. +1
